snippet: Apple’s newest iPhone takes a big leap from past models by shedding a home button and including a face scanner. And remember the price: $999.

headline.main: The iPhone X Is Cool. That Doesn’t Mean You Are Ready for It.
headline.print_headline: The Best iPhone May Be Too Cool For the Masses

snippet: What if it’s not that bad that so much economic, social and political power is held by Apple, Amazon, Google, Facebook and Microsoft?

headline.main: The Upside of Being Ruled by the Five Tech Giants
headline.print_headline: The Upside Of Bowing To Big Tech

snippet: Gu Xiaomeng, a 24-year-old primary school teacher in the eastern Chinese city of Suzhou, says she's excited about the new iPhone X, set to go on sale on Friday. The challenge for Apple Inc is to persuade her to actually buy one.

headline.main: Apple X Factor: China Buyers Rapt by New iPhone, but Will They Buy?
headline.print_headline: Apple X Factor: China Buyers Rapt by New iPhone, but Will They Buy?

snippet: Alphabet Inc's Google and Facebook Inc on Wednesday joined a legal challenge by more than 100 tech companies against a decision to end protection for so-called 'Dreamer' immigrants, the companies told Reuters.

headline.main: Tech Companies Join Support of 'Dreamers,' Challenging Trump
headline.print_headline: Tech Companies Join Support of 'Dreamers,' Challenging Trump

snippet: Qualcomm Inc's fourth-quarter profit and revenue beat market expectations as strength in its smartphone chips business was complemented by demand for chips used in automobiles and for the Internet of Things (IoT).

headline.main: Demand for Modem, IoT Chips Helps Qualcomm Top Estimates
headline.print_headline: Demand for Modem, IoT Chips Helps Qualcomm Top Estimates

snippet: Wearable device maker Fitbit Inc forecast a better-than-expected bottom line for the holiday quarter, as the company reaps the benefits of its latest launches.

headline.main: Fitbit Reports Better Than Expected Quarterly Revenue
headline.print_headline: Fitbit Reports Better Than Expected Quarterly Revenue

snippet: Shares in Sony Corp soared to a nine-year high on Wednesday after it forecast record earnings that have vindicated its restructuring efforts and raised expectations of sustained momentum in profitability.

headline.main: Record Profit Forecast for a Resurgent Sony Sends Shares to Nine-Year High
headline.print_headline: Record Profit Forecast for a Resurgent Sony Sends Shares to Nine-Year High

snippet: Japan's Sony Corp said on Wednesday it has brought back AIBO more than a decade since it last made the robotic dog, as the electronics and entertainment firm seeks to rebuild its reputation for innovation after years of restructuring.

headline.main: Sony Revives Pet AI Project With Updated AIBO Robot Dog
headline.print_headline: Sony Revives Pet AI Project With Updated AIBO Robot Dog
